body.name: Acer Predator Cestus 330 Gaming Mouse with PixArt 3335 Sensor, Adjustable DPI Settings, 16.8 Million RGB Color Lighting Combinations & NVIDIA Reflex
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 29 mins
features: Tracking Accuracy: Make use of 5 DPI settings that automatically switch on-the-fly because different games call for different playstyles
PixArt 3335 Sensor: Precision optical sensor helps you zero in on your target with ultra-accurate, high-speed tracking from 16,000 DPI down to 1 DPI so you can fine-tune to virtually any mousepad

Predator QuarterMaster: Achieve precision and accuracy with personalized battle controls including 7 programmable buttons, 5 DPI settings, and lighting combos directly from the downloaded QuarterMaster software
7 Programmable Buttons: Configure your buttons just how you like it including a DPI on-the-fly switch to control your movement and improve accuracy
Light It Up: With 16.8 million color combinations and four lighting patterns to play with, the possibilities are practically endless

Cover More Ground: 1,000Hz polling rate sends data to your PC every 1 millisecond; 40g acceleration rate and 400 IPS picks up your fastest movements. NVIDIA Reflex accurately tests this connection between your PC and mouse
Lasting Play: Tested to last 20 million clicks with an ergonomic design for right-handed claw grip players
Compatible with Your Systems: USB port; compatible with Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 8, Windows 7
body.description: The Acer lineup of Predator gaming PC accessories was designed for hardcore gamers by hardcore gamers. Our PC gaming accessories have strategic features to help you improve your stats and take your gaming to the next level. Light up the battlefield with millions of RGB lighting combinations. Predator QuarterMaster controls settings, programmable buttons and more so you can personalize your Acer gaming mouse. Adjust your DPI on-the-fly with the PixArt 3335 sensor. Effortlessly scroll, swivel, slide—without a single miss. (NP.MCE11.00V).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome design, and solid quality.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mouse after using it for about 2 months now. The build quality is great and feels really good in the hand due to its shape and thumb rest. It is a wired USB mouse, which I greatly prefer to the wireless ones, and the cord is pretty long, giving you more than enough space to move around. I do recommend using a mousepad, it just gives you a better response.One of the highlights of this mouse is that you can select the color you want for it. The colors you can select are: red, blue, green, cyan, lime green, and pink. The light pulsates slowly too, I don't think there is an option to make the light solid. Please keep in mind that it DOES NOT fade between colors on its own, you have to set the colors yourself on the middle buttons behind the scroll wheel, which is a tiny bit disappointing, but it's still a super cool feature nonetheless!My main form of play is with a controller, although, I have tested this mouse for gaming in a few titles such as Hitman 2, Star Wars The Old Republic, GTA V, & Minecraft. It has surprising response and accuracy considering its price range, I never find it missing a beat where I need the performance most. The side button is great for quick shots since your thumb is readily at the button. The option to weigh it down is also great, I definitely like a heavier mouse, as it felt far too light without the weights.To be honest, my only gripe I have had with the mouse is with the scroll wheel. It's very easy to click on accident, which can sometimes cause it to begin scrolling up or down a page on its own. I'll have to click the page to stop it and readjust to where I was. It doesn't happen all that often because I've gotten used to being more gentle when scrolling, but it is a nuisance sometimes, especially if you're in a hurry. I don't find this being such a problem to deduct any stars though.I would say, if you're looking for a solid quality mouse that feels good, looks good, but more importantly, performs good, you'd probably be happy with it! It won't break your bank and seems like it will hold up well overtime with some care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great gaming mouse

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple RGB gaming mouse
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing too fancy about this mouse. It's lightweight and have simple RGB lighting. The DPI on it is fine and is effective enough for what I am currently using it for on my gaming laptop. If you're looking for a more customizable gaming mouse, I would look elsewhere. But for a simple mouse with RGB lighting for basic everyday use, I would pick it up if it's on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product but need better quality material
reviews.reviewText: Good product. I purchase this product just to match the brand name with my other devices. Compare to Razer mamba brand, it has about the same functions in performance but doesn't have much options with light settings, calibrating, and comforts. It is too expensive in price compare to the Razer Mamba. The mouse itself and grip are made of hard plastic. It doesn't have rubber grip or palm grove support design like the Razer Mamba would have. The click mechanism is little too loud. This product would be perfect to match its price if the clicking mechanism is much more quieter, the material and design for palm support is more comfortably fit, and the settings come with more variety in options.Review edit 7/4/2022Reviews above were base on item function and appearance when first used. After less than 6 months, the item begins to feel very hot under the palm, battery status continue to get low even it is on plug in. The DPI functions were unresponsive and skipping around when it is adjusted. The back lit for the logo light also burnt out. Mouse pointer is malfunction and skipping around the screen while in use, especially during in game. Overall, with this brand name , it is very expensive and the quality is very bad. Base on this result, I would not recommend this product to anyone, especially those who are using for online games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Okay so I bought an Acer Nitro 5 and figured. Why the heck not with the mouse too you know.I've used and gone through tons of Razers and Logitech mice.I REALLY like this mouse for some reason, I have smaller hands maybe? The adjustable weights are nice but.This is now my main gaming mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised on how nice this is for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice mouse. It has a good weight and feel. Plastics have a soft velvet feel. All the buttons click nicely (no sponginess). I think the size is good too for my hand size (average women sized hand). I haven’t put it through it’s paces with precision gaming so I cannot speak to that. I’ve mainly played Overwatch with it so far (I play healer and tanks mostly) and it’s been good there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift and she is happy with it !

reviews.reviewTitle: Mouse grande, não há controle de iluminação
reviews.reviewText: O produto é lindo, combina demais com o notebook acer nitro.O material não é premium, mas é de excelente qualidade. O botão de rolagem é emborrachado, tem uma textura interessante.Sensibilidade muito boa, para jogar ou trabalhar é sensacional.Tive um pouco de dificuldade de adaptação, pois utilizava um mouse bem menor.Mas agora já não trocaria novamente. Excelente custo benefício. Compre sem medo!

Lo compré hace más de una año y sigue funcionando super bien! La calidad del producto es muy buena, aún que el scroll no es tan sensible, pero eso me ayuda muchísimo con la precisión en AutoCad y SKP.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works smoothly and fits your hand nicely
reviews.reviewText: This mouse works great! I had purchased this mouse and my husband loved it so much too that he purchased one for himself. Fits both our hands nicely and feels comfortable to hold. Some of the side buttons don’t register for gaming, but the feel of the mouse makes up for it. Nice that you can change the weighting of it, but for us the way it came weighted worked well. You can easily change the speed of the curser as well and that determines the light colour. Overall both very happy with our mouses over our outdated gaming mice.
